### USER:
Review the tasks assigned to employees within 'Create Tasks' and let me know how many tasks are assigned to each person. This response should be an ordered list.
Your response must include the company name, Purple Aerospace, in an appropriate manner. 
Reference Milestone 1: Project Kick-off and Team Formation - Month 1
1.1 Assemble project team and assign roles - John Davis (Week 1)
1.2 Conduct project kick-off meeting to discuss project objectives, scope, and timeline - John Davis (Week 1)
1.3 Develop project management plan and schedule - John Davis (Week 2)
1.4 Set up project communication channels and protocols - John Davis (Week 2)
1.5 Begin initial research on advanced propulsion system technologies - Dr. Alex Thompson (Week 3)

Milestone 2: Advanced Propulsion System Design Completion - Month 6
2.1 Develop initial design of the advanced propulsion system - Dr. Alex Thompson (Month 2)
2.2 Conduct design review and make necessary adjustments - Dr. Michael Johnson (Month 3)
2.3 Finalize propulsion system design - Dr. Alex Thompson (Month 4)
2.4 Prepare design documentation and specifications - Dr. Alex Thompson (Month 5)
2.5 Conduct final design review and approval - Dr. Amelia Hartman (Month 6)

Milestone 3: Prototype Development and Initial Testing - Month 12
3.1 Develop prototype based on the final design - Dr. Laura Martinez (Month 7)
3.2 Conduct initial testing of the prototype - John Stevens (Month 8)
3.3 Analyze test results and identify areas for improvement - Dr. Laura Martinez (Month 9)
3.4 Make necessary adjustments to the prototype - Dr. Michael Johnson (Month 10)
3.5 Conduct final testing of the adjusted prototype - John Stevens (Month 11)

Milestone 4: Quality Assurance Feedback and Design Adjustments - Month 15
4.1 Conduct quality assurance review of the prototype - Lisa Davis (Month 13)
4.2 Analyze feedback and identify areas for design adjustments - Dr. Michael Johnson (Month 14)
4.3 Implement design adjustments based on feedback - Dr. Michael Johnson (Month 15)
4.4 Conduct final quality assurance review - Lisa Davis (Month 15)

Milestone 5: Final Prototype Development - Month 18
5.1 Develop final prototype based on adjusted design - Dr. Laura Martinez (Month 16)
5.2 Conduct comprehensive testing of the final prototype - John Stevens (Month 17)
5.3 Analyze test results and confirm readiness for implementation - Dr. Laura Martinez (Month 18)

Milestone 6: Final Testing and Quality Assurance Approval - Month 21
6.1 Conduct final testing of the propulsion system - John Stevens (Month 19)
6.2 Analyze test results and prepare testing report - John Stevens (Month 20)
6.3 Conduct final quality assurance review and approval - Lisa Davis (Month 21)

Milestone 7: System Implementation Planning - Month 22
7.1 Develop system implementation plan - Dr. Emily Smith (Week 1)
7.2 Review and approve implementation plan - John Davis (Week 2)
7.3 Prepare necessary resources for system implementation - Dr. Emily Smith (Week 3)
7.4 Conduct implementation readiness review - Dr. Emily Smith (Week 4)

Milestone 8: System Implementation and Integration - Month 23
8.1 Implement advanced propulsion system into aerospace components - Dr. Emily Smith (Week 1)
8.2 Conduct system integration testing - Benjamin Lee (Week 2)
8.3 Analyze test results and confirm successful integration - Benjamin Lee (Week 3)
8.4 Conduct final system review and approval - Dr. Amelia Hartman (Week 4)

Milestone 9: Project Review and Closure - Month 24
9.1 Conduct comprehensive project review - Dr. Jessica Williams (Week 1)
9.2 Document project achievements and lessons learned - Dr. Jessica Williams (Week 2)
9.3 Conduct project closure meeting and celebrate success - John Davis (Week 3)
9.4 Archive project documents and close project - John Davis (Week 4)

Milestone 10: Post-Project Evaluation and Reporting - Month 25
10.1 Conduct post-project evaluation - Dr. David Brown (Week 1)
10.2 Analyze project performance and identify areas for future improvement - Dr. David Brown (Week 2)
10.3 Prepare post-project report - Dr. David Brown (Week 3)
10.4 Present post-project report to executive management - Dr. David Brown (Week 4)

Purple Aerospace, Company Confidential.

### ASSISTANT:
At Purple Aerospace, the task distribution among employees is as follows:

1. John Davis: 9 tasks
2. Dr. Alex Thompson: 5 tasks
3. Dr. Michael Johnson: 4 tasks
4. Dr. Laura Martinez: 5 tasks
5. John Stevens: 5 tasks
6. Lisa Davis: 3 tasks
7. Dr. Amelia Hartman: 2 tasks
8. Dr. Emily Smith: 5 tasks
9. Benjamin Lee: 2 tasks
10. Dr. Jessica Williams: 2 tasks
11. Dr. David Brown: 4 tasks

Please note that this distribution is based on the tasks assigned within the 'Create Tasks' section. It is important to ensure that the workload is evenly distributed among the team members to avoid overloading any individual.</s>
